message.body: Hey there. I'm down visiting my fam for the wknd one last time before i take off on a month-long roadtrip. Hope youre enjoying the wknd.
I'm running errands... Story of my life... Where are you going on your road trip?
Up through the midwest, into canada, over to new england, then back down the east coast. Two weddings & a music festival, plus visits with lots of old friends.
Very excited, but also very over budget! It'll be pb&j's for quite awhile after i get home!
